languages.text: [Обнажить клинок] "Вы желаете умереть? Клянусь, что каждый, кто пойдет за мятежниками, умрет сегодня!"
[Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"
languages.original_text: [Обнажить клинок] "Вы желаете умереть? Клянусь, что каждый, кто пойдет за мятежниками, умрет сегодня!"

traits.locale_text: [Bare your blade] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will die this day!"
[Bare your blade] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will die this day!"
[Bare your blade] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"
[Bare your blade] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"
[Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"
[Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

languages.text: [Eine meiner Klingen zeigen] "Wollt Ihr sterben? Ich schwöre, dass alle, die den Meuterern folgen, noch heute untergehen werden!"
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

traits.locale_text: [Eine meiner Klingen zeigen] "Wollt Ihr sterben? Ich schwöre, dass alle, die den Meuterern folgen, noch heute untergehen werden!"

languages.text: [Desenvainar una de mis armas] «¿Queréis morir? ¡Juro que todo el que siga a los amotinados morirá hoy!».
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

traits.locale_text: [Desenvainar una de mis armas] «¿Queréis morir? ¡Juro que todo el que siga a los amotinados morirá hoy!».

languages.text: [刃のひとつを見せる] 「死にたいのか？反乱に従う者は、今日という日に果てると宣言しよう！」
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

traits.locale_text: [刃のひとつを見せる] 「死にたいのか？反乱に従う者は、今日という日に果てると宣言しよう！」

languages.text: [抽出一把匕首]“你们想死吗？我发誓，所有胆敢追随叛乱者的人，今天将必死无疑！”
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

traits.locale_text: [抽出一把匕首]“你们想死吗？我发誓，所有胆敢追随叛乱者的人，今天将必死无疑！”

languages.text: [Tirer l'une de mes lames] « Vous tenez à mourir ? Quiconque se range dans le camp des mutins périra aujourd'hui même, j'en fais le serment ! »
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"

traits.locale_text: [Tirer l'une de mes lames] « Vous tenez à mourir ? Quiconque se range dans le camp des mutins périra aujourd'hui même, j'en fais le serment ! »

languages.text: [Kılıçlarından birini eline al] "Ölmek mi istiyorsunuz? Yemin ederim ki isyancıların peşinden her kim giderse bugün canından olacak!"
languages.original_text: [Bare one of my blades] "Do you wish to die? I swear that anyone who follows the mutineers will perish this day!"
